t: Amazon-Native Brand Hero Cosmetics Sells for $630M - Marketplace Pulse
s: September 7, 2022 - Hero Cosmetics, an acne care brand born on Amazon, was acquired for $630 million this week. Hero launched on Amazon in 2017 with one SKU that has since become the #1 beauty product on Amazon.
